name: Reo & Mono... ZIP Away!
description:
A short RPGM game made for (You)RPGM Game Jam #9.5 - Monster.

A pair of little monsters  make a surprising new friend!

-will add more here later!!-

Very special thanks to a great friend for their bonus artwork!
